languages.text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотника за головами{/g} цель с эффектом "захват" получает суммирующиеся штрафы −(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} охотника за головами))% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}. Как только цель подвигается или получит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, эффект будет снят и {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} перестанут действовать.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.
languages.original_text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотника за головами{/g} цель с эффектом "захват" получает суммирующиеся штрафы −(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} охотника за головами))% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}. Как только цель подвигается или получит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, эффект будет снят и {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} перестанут действовать.

traits.locale_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} erleidet dieses Ziel einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der Beute + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})) % auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, der gestapelt werden kann. Nachdem sich die Beute bewegt oder {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, werden der Effekt "Fang" und die Abzüge entfernt.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Jägers erleidet dieses Ziel einen sich aufaddierenden −<u>(2× ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} Beute + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Jägers))</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}. Nachdem sich die Beute bewegt oder Schaden erleidet, werden der{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Beute und Abzüge entfernt.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g}, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} cumulative de −(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la prise + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})) % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de la cible. Dès que la cible se déplace ou subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, l'effet Prise et les pénalités correspondantes sont supprimés.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Chasseur, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} cumulative de -(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la prise + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Chasseur)) % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de la cible. Dès que la prise se déplace ou subit des dégâts, l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Prise et les pénalités sont supprimés.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎{/g}人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，目标敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果，等同于（2×（目标{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}+赏金猎人的{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}））%。当受到诱捕的敌人移动或承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，诱捕效果与相关减值就会解除。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎{/g}人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，目标敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果，等同于（2×（目标{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}+赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}））%。当受到诱捕的敌人移动或承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，诱捕效果与相关减值就会解除。

languages.original_text: At the start of the Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −<u>(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}))</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers damage, the catch effect and the penalties are removed.

languages.text: Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g}, este objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa de −(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del capturado + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} del cazarrecompensas)) % a sus puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}. Una vez que el capturado se mueva o sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, se eliminan el efecto capturado y las penalizaciones.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del cazador, este objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa de −<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del capturado + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del cazador))</u> % a sus puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}. Una vez que el capturado se mueva o sufra daño, se eliminan el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} capturado y las penalizaciones.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にてこのターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に<b>−<u>(2 × (捕虜の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g} + バウンティハンターの{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))</u> %<b>のスタッキング{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。捕虜が移動するか{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、捕虜の効果とペナルティは取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

traits.locale_text: ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、このターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g} と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}に<u>(2 × (捕虜の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g} + ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}))</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g} (累積可）を受ける。捕虜が移動するかダメージを受けると、捕虜の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}とペナルティは取り除かれる。

languages.text: Bu hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı'nın{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerlerine −%(2 × (yakalananın {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g} + Ödül Avcısı'nın {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})) kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Bu ceza puanı, üst üste birikebilir. Yakalanan hareket ettiğinde veya {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında, yakalanan etkisi ve ceza puanları ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.

Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and penalties are removed.
